trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the provided <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando fornecido <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: The `item` and `commandSource` parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: O `item` e `commandSource` parâmetros inicializar o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>Propriedades com os respetivos valores.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the given <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>, and the original command arguments.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o fornecido <> </> *>, <> </> *> e os argumentos de comando original.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: This constructor builds a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor baseia-se um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The `item` and `commandSource` parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: O `item` e `commandSource` parâmetros inicializar o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>Propriedades com os respetivos valores.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor includes an `originalArgs` parameter; this form of the constructor allows you to pass in a set of command arguments through the `originalArgs` parameter, which is useful for handling bubbled events.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inclui um `originalArgs` parâmetro; este formato do construtor permite-lhe transmita um conjunto de argumentos de comando através de `originalArgs` parâmetro, que é útil para processar eventos bubbled.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>

trans-unit.source: The original arguments inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos originais herdadas de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o controlo que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O controlo que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: Define ou devolve o nome do comando predefinido.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver definida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>tentar compor um atalho para invocar o comando de predefinição.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in `ListView` displays the first field as a link to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: No HTML, a predefinição de composição em `ListView` apresenta o primeiro campo como uma hiperligação para o `DetailsView` de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>propriedade, clicar na ligação invoca o comando de predefinição.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Invocar o comando de predefinição gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the DefaultCommand property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>do <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>objecto está definido para o valor da propriedade DefaultCommand.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se não for definido um comando predefinido, deve incluir um comando com o mesmo nome na coleção de comandos.

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available by rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo não é possível compor um elemento de gráfico que inclua um atalho para o comando de predefinição, o comando de predefinição ainda está disponível ao compor o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o item da lista que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: The list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: O item da lista que gerou o evento.
